name: Code Flask Back End Api Register Agent
shortDescription: Creates the /api/register endpoint for user registration.
fullDescription: This agent is responsible for implementing the /api/register endpoint in the Flask backend. It handles the registration of new users based on the provided base logic, ensuring that user data is correctly processed and stored.
UseCases:
1. Enable new users to register into the system.
2. Validate and store user registration data securely.
3. Integrate initial authentication flow into the backend.
